name: qgis
description: QGIS is a free, open source, cross platform (lin/win/mac) geographical information system (GIS)

features.name: server
features.description: Determines whether QGIS server should be built

features.name: process
features.description: Determines whether the command line QGIS process tool should be built

features.name: 3d
features.description: Determines whether QGIS 3D library should be built

features.name: bindings
features.description: Determines whether Python bindings should be built

features.name: gui
features.description: Determines whether the QGIS gui should be built

features.name: desktop
features.description: Determines whether the QGIS desktop (main app) should be built

features.name: customwidgets
features.description: Determines whether the QGIS custom widgets for QtCreator should be built

features.name: quick
features.description: Build the QGIS quick components for mobile interfaces
